name: Everything is fine (benoitbm)
description:
It is the year 20XX. Post offices are now overloaded with unsorted mail.

The best engineers in the world have been asked to solve this problem.
They found a revolutionary way to solve the problem : INCINERATE THE UNSORTED MAIL!
As an employee of a big mail-sorting company, you will contribute to society by sorting all this mail and make sure that everything is fine.

*Be warned: Everything is, in fact, not fine.
** This game may induce third degree burns. Keep away from children.
